titles.title: A bill to amend title 40, United States Code, to add certain counties to the definition of "Appalachian region".
A bill to amend title 40, United States Code, to add certain counties to the definition of "Appalachian region".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: This bill adds the Tennessee counties of Hickman, Humphreys, and Perry to the definition of Appalachian region for purposes of Appalachian regional development efforts.
